diseases.name: common cold
precautions: Avoid close contact with sick individuals

child.usage: Give 10-15 mg/kg every 4-6 hours as needed. Do not exceed 5 doses in 24 hours.

adult.usage: Take 500-1000 mg of paracetamol every 4-6 hours or 200-400 mg of ibuprofen every 6-8 hours as needed.

diseases.name: flu
precautions: Cover mouth and nose when coughing or sneezing
Avoid crowded places during flu season

child.usage: Dose is weight-based. Typically, 30-75 mg twice daily for 5 days. Consult a pediatrician.

adult.usage: Take 75 mg twice daily for 5 days.

diseases.name: chickenpox
precautions: Stay isolated until all blisters have crusted over

child.usage: Apply to affected areas 3-4 times daily to soothe itching.

adult.usage: Take 800 mg 5 times daily for 7 days. Start within 24 hours of rash onset.

diseases.name: asthma
precautions: Use a humidifier if the air is dry
Keep inhalers accessible at all times

child.usage: Administer 1-2 puffs every 4-6 hours as needed. Consult a doctor for chronic use.

adult.usage: Use 2 puffs every 4-6 hours as needed. For long-term control, consult a doctor about corticosteroids.

child.usage: Administer dosage as prescribed by a pediatric endocrinologist.

adult.usage: Take 500-1000 mg twice daily with meals. Adjust dosage as recommended by a physician.

child.medication: Consult pediatrician for specific antihypertensive medications
child.usage: Dosage and usage depend on child's weight and specific condition.

adult.usage: Take 5-10 mg once daily. Adjust dosage as prescribed by a physician.

diseases.name: migraine
precautions: Avoid known triggers like bright lights or loud noises

child.usage: Administer 10 mg/kg every 6-8 hours as needed. Do not exceed the recommended daily dose.

adult.usage: Take 50-100 mg at the onset of migraine. Repeat after 2 hours if needed, not exceeding 200 mg per day.

diseases.name: anemia
precautions: Eat iron-rich foods like spinach and red meat
Avoid tea or coffee with meals to enhance iron absorption
Take vitamin C to aid iron absorption
Get regular blood tests to monitor levels

child.usage: Administer 3-6 mg/kg of elemental iron daily in divided doses.

adult.usage: Take 325 mg once or twice daily with meals.

diseases.name: allergic rhinitis
precautions: Avoid allergens like pollen, dust, and pet dander
Keep windows closed during high pollen seasons

child.usage: Administer 5 mg once daily for children 6 years or older. For younger children, consult a pediatrician.
